attributes.action: Start a public enquiry into the rising fuel costs from June 2020 to June 2022.
attributes.additional_details:
The cost of fuel is increasing relentlessly. This is not only effecting households directly but indirectly through increased cost of living due to increased costs of services and products.

We want an open enquiry to show why these costs are increasing and where the spend is going. There is no clarity on these cost increases and should be clear to the public.
attributes.background: Start an open public enquiry into why the costs of petrol and diesel have increased by 60% in the last 48 months. Full public access to financial reports, commercial costs, quarterly financial forecasts. For: government, suppliers and manufacturers.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603624
